name: Mamba Maze
description:
The limitation for Mini Jam 103 was "You are your own enemy," so I made a snake game where you have to navigate around your massive tail.  The theme was "Darkness" so I originally made the snake be a Black Mamba, but it turns out green looked better, and the theme was optional anyway.

I only had a few hours to work on it, but I like the concept so maybe I'll upgrade it post-jam.
